sqlList.sql: SELECT Table_name AS Cols FROM User_tables order by Table_name asc

select user_tab_cols.column_name, user_col_comments.comments from user_tab_cols LEFT join user_col_comments on user_col_comments.TABLE_NAME=USER_TAB_COLS.TABLE_NAME and user_col_comments.COLUMN_NAME=USER_TAB_COLS.COLUMN_NAME where user_tab_cols.table_name=:TABLENM
